title: An Act further defining a quorum of the Worcester Regional Retirement System Board Advisory Council

abstracts.abstract: By Representative O'Day of West Boylston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2926) of James J. O'Day and Robyn K. Kennedy relative to further defining a quorum of the Worcester Regional Retirement System Board Advisory Council.  Public Service.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Service
Hearing scheduled for 09/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2

Hearing rescheduled to 09/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-03:10 PM in A-2                                                                                                                                          and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
